channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Philippine lawmakers plan to approve bill to ban ore exports
item.description: The Philippines hopes to emulate Indonesia, where a similar ban on metal ore exports boosted investment in smelting and refineries.

item.title: Amazon’s stock drops as earnings outlook underwhelms
'Canary in the coal mine': More homeowners are late on their mortgage payments
Why buyout offers — like Trump’s to federal workers — are a hard sell
Hordes of rats are infesting cities and the $27 billion a year problem is only getting worse
item.description: The rodents' numbers are rising because of conditions that humans have created.

item.title: Trump’s focus on 10-year yield to cut borrowing costs raises this key problem
Fed's Powell to testify to Congress next week, his first appearance since July
New Zealand hints at letting more foreign investors buy homes
item.description: Currently only Australians and Singaporeans can be non-resident and own homes in New Zealand.

item.title: Demand for Tesla nosedives in EV-friendly Europe amid jeers over Elon Musk’s endorsement of the far right
item.description: Popularity has plummeted in markets like Germany, a country still haunted by its fascist past, where Tesla's share of EV sales plummeted to just 3.7% ...

item.title: Amazon’s profit is suddenly going through the roof, fueling CEO Andy Jassy’s $100 billion AI spending spree to fight Google and Microsoft
item.description: Once profit-starved, Amazon is displaying a version of itself that many rivals have long feared.
